message: I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste any more time with unfair offers. This is a good deal for you considering the shrinking pot!
Come on, meet me in the middle!
Time is running out, Alice!  This is my final offer - take it or leave it. It's better than what you'll get in later rounds.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it!
Okay, Alice, you drive a hard bargain. Let's stop wasting time and split it evenly. This is the best you'll get!
